SoC
Arch: MIPS (1004Kc)







MT7621A(T)
---------- 
5p GbE, 
1x RGMII, 
3x PCIe,
1x USB 3.0, 
2x USB 2.0,
L1-32/32kB, 
L2-256kB, 
DDR2/DDR3 256/512MB
TFBGA378,
HNAT
NAPT
HQoS
HW Crypto Engine
UART
JTAG

MT7621DA(T)
-----------
5p GbE,
1x RGMII,
3x PCIe,
1x USB 3.0,
2x USB 2.0,
L1-32/32kB,
L2-256kB, 
int. RAM 128MB (DDR3),
HNAT
NAPT
HQoS
HW Crypto Engine
UART
JTAG


MT7621N(T)
----------
MT7621NT, 2x RGMII, 2x PCIe, 1x USB 3.0, 2x USB 2.0,
L1-32/32kB, L2-256kB, DDR2 256MB,
HNAT, NAPT, HQoS, HW Crypto Engine, UART, JTAG

MT7621S(T)
----------
MT7621ST, 5p GbE, 1x RGMII, 3x PCIe, 1x USB 3.0, 2x USB 2.0,
L1-32/32kB, L2-256kB, DDR2/DDR3 256/512MB, LFBGA346
HNAT, NAPT, HQoS, HW Crypto Engine, UART, JTAG
